00026 #ifndef SDBX_RTREE_VERIFY_H
00027 #define SDBX_RTREE_VERIFY_H
00028 
00029 #include <vector>
00030 
00032 __RTREE_TEMPLATE_DEFN
00033 bool RTree<__RTREE_TEMPLATE_FN>::Verify()
00034 {
00035         uint64_t leaf_count = 0;
00036 
00037         if (backend.m_treeHeight)
00038         {
00039                 std::vector<IdType>                     id;
00040                 std::vector<std::size_t>        idx;
00041                 std::vector<BoundingBox>        bounds;
00042                 
00043                 // reduce allocations
00044                 id.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00045                 idx.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00046                 bounds.reserve(backend.m_treeHeight);
00047                 
00048                 // initialize the stack
00049                 id.push_back(backend.m_rootId);
00050                 idx.push_back(0);
00051         
00052                 // this could be recursive, but that would be so much easier! :)
00053                 while (!id.empty())
00054                 {
00055                         if (id.size() < backend.m_treeHeight)
00056                         {
00057                                 Node * node = backend.get_node(id.back());
00058                                 std::size_t cur_idx = idx.back()++;
00059                                 
00060                                 if (node->items.size() == 0)
00061                                 {
00062                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 0");
00063                                         return false;
00064                                 }
00065                                 
00066                                 if (cur_idx < node->items.size())
00067                                 {
00068                                         // perform a check on each level when you initially enter it
00069                                         if (cur_idx == 0 && bounds.size() > 0) 
00070                                         {
00071                                                 // verify that all nodes are enclosed
00072                                                 for (std::size_t i = 0; i < node->items.size(); ++i)
00073                                                 {
00074                                                         if (!bounds.back().encloses(node->items[i].key))
00075                                                         {
00076                                                                 assert(0 && "verify failure type 1");
00077                                                                 return false;
00078                                                         }
00079                                                 }
00080                                         }
00081 
00082                                         // iterate over all nodes, traverse down the current level
00083                                         id.push_back(node->items[idx.back()-1].id);
00084                                         bounds.push_back(node->items[idx.back()-1].key);
00085                                         idx.push_back(0);
00086                                         
00087                                         continue;
00088                                 }
00089                         }
00090                         else
00091                         {
00092                                 // at a leaf
00093                                 LeafNode * leaf = backend.get_leaf_node(id.back());
00094                                 
00095                                 // perform a check on each leaf level
00096                                 if (bounds.size() > 0) 
00097                                 {
00098                                         // verify that all nodes are enclosed
00099                                         for (std::size_t x = 0; x < leaf->items.size(); x++)
00100                                         {
00101                                                 if (!bounds.back().encloses(leaf->items[x].key))
00102                                                 {
00103                                                         assert(0 && "verify failure type 2");
00104                                                         return false;
00105                                                 }
00106                                         }
00107                                 }
00108                                 
00109                                 leaf_count += leaf->items.size();
00110                         }
00111                         
00112 
00113                         // go up a level                        
00114                         id.pop_back();
00115                         idx.pop_back();
00116 
00117                         if (bounds.size())
00118                         {
00119                                 bounds.pop_back();
00120                                 assert(bounds.size() == idx.size()-1);
00121                         }
00122 
00123                         assert(id.size() == idx.size());
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 
00127         if (leaf_count != GetItemCount())
00128         {
00129                 assert(0 && "verify failure type 3");
00130                 return false;
00131         }
00132 
00133         return true;
00134 }
